dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Oh my, I knew I was not alone in this woods...

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: How did I know, you ask? Well, I'm a little 'magical', you see.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Anywho. Greetings little hero, hope you don’t mind me not stretching your hand heh.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Are you by any chance what they call a 'Siffler' ?

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: Yes, I believe I am.

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, I don't really know what I am.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Fascinating, the dark forces that run savages on this island could not get ahold of you. Truly fascinating.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Thankfully I know a tad of Siffler from my journeys, what a beautifully witty language you people invented.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Anywho. I’ve been wandering this woods looking for its secrets. I feel something hiding not very far from here, I can hear its whistle.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: And this, a stone from the heavens, has fallen into my arms —— well, you know what I mean.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: It hides a purpose so great I cannot begin to fathom it, I am sure of it...

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Wait, it is calling… calling for you.

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: I'm feeling something...

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Mmmm. Very well, I'll pass this talisman onto you, but only if you assist me first.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: You see, I am lacking the so-called arms, so it is a hard task for me to recollect what I am in need of.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Luckily, you possess not only one but two of them, how good for me.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Anywho, listen closely...

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Bring me her, who grows and feeds from the feet of the castle (a flower near the castle). Him that hides from the glowing sun cowardly near the exit of the forest. And...

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Come back to me when you find them. I’ll be waiting.

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: Well, I understand, I will go looking for it.

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: Before I leave, What's your name?

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: My name you ask? A truly wise question. Sadly I have no answer.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: But you, hero, can call me Sorcerer, if that suffices heh.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Good luck, little hero!
dialogues.alternative_text: Still waiting, and so are they. Go on, hero.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Welcome back hero. You have reunited the triplets? How wonderful, let me see.
